span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 尊崇，顺从： a readiness or willingness to yield to the wishes of others
【例】 He is shown much deference by his colleagues
【近】 acquiescence['ækwɪ'ɛsns], compliancy, docility[dəu'siləti], obedience[ə'biːdɪəns], submissiveness
【反】 contempt, defiance, disobedience, intractability, recalcitrance 轻视，不服从
【派】 deferential adj. 表示尊重的，恭敬的：showing or expressing deference
【反】 imperious, impudent 专横无礼的
【记】defer遵从
